body_html:
Perhaps try cmake? Be sure to read everything here.
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources
Unfortunately building from source (particularly on Windows) is quite difficult and not recommended unless you are comfortable diagnosing the kind of errors that come from these tools.

body:
Perhaps try cmake? Be sure to read everything here.
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources
Unfortunately building from source (particularly on Windows) is quite difficult and not recommended unless you are comfortable diagnosing the kind of errors that come from these tools.
